CustomField.description: Defines the Daily Pay Code Cap that applies to the Breakpoint. This field is automatically populated when a Pay Code Cap applies to the Pay Code used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the Daily Pay Code Cap that applies to the Breakpoint. This field is automatically populated when a Pay Code Cap applies to the Pay Code used.
CustomField.label: Daily Pay Code Cap Record
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Interpretation Breakpoints with Daily Pay Code Cap
